mapper.insert: INSERT INTO offerer ( id, name, password, offererName, offererNumber, offererBrief, phone, cellPhone, payDate, eosDate, sidoId, sigunguId, postcode, address1, address2, mapFilename ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{password}, #{offererName}, #{offererNumber}, #{offererBrief}, #{phone}, #{cellPhone}, #{payDate}, #{eosDate}, #{sidoId}, #{sigunguId}, #{postcode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{mapFilename} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, password, offererName, registerDate, offererNumber, offererBrief, phone, cellPhone, payDate, eosDate, sidoId, sigunguId, postcode, address1, address2, mapFilename FROM offerer WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE offerer SET mapFilename = #{mapFilename} WHERE id = #{id}
